definition: third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl
alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: No parabens, aluminum, propylene glycol, synthetic fragrances or harsh preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 没有苯甲酸酯，铝，丙二醇，合成香料或防腐剂苛刻。

sentences.english: Therefore, 15% propylene glycol was finally chosen as the penetration enhancer.
sentences.chinese: 因此，选择15%丙二醇作为透皮促进剂。

sentences.english: The smoker inhales doses of nicotine vaporized with the help of a solvent such as propylene glycol.
sentences.chinese: 尼古丁溶解在丙二醇等溶剂中，挥发后被吸烟者吸入。

sentences.english: Researches in propanediol methyl ether synthesis catalysts were reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 综述了丙二醇甲醚合成催化剂研究的最新进展。

sentences.english: Propylene glycol , Glycerine , Lactic acid and other.
sentences.chinese: 氨甲环酸丙二醇，甘油，乳酸等。

sentences.english: The preparation and purification process of polypropylene glycol was studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了聚丙二醇的合成和精制方法。

sentences.english: The most common epoxies are those made from the reaction of bisphenol A with epichlorohydrin.
sentences.chinese: 采用反应精馏新工艺由环氧丙烷水合制丙二醇。

sentences.english: Synthesis of Propylene Glycol Monomethyl Ether with Novel Alkaline catalyst is developed and manufactured.
sentences.chinese: 研制开发了新型碱性催化剂制备丙二醇单甲醚。

sentences.english: A new process of Hydration of propylene oxide to glycols was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 采用反应精馏新工艺由环氧丙烷水合制丙二醇。

sentences.english: We discussed the technological conditions of synthesizing propylene glycol monoether acetate.
sentences.chinese: 对合成丙二醇单乙醚乙酸酯的工艺条件进行了讨论。

definition: xanthan/xanthanate gum (polysaccharide food additive used as a thickener)

pinyin: dui4 qiang3 ji1 ben3 jia3 suan1 zhi3
